This website collects comparisons of *Amphibolis* and *Posidonia* comparative analyses.

[Repeat comparison plots](plot.html) - Comparing genome sizes and repeat/TE content

[Phylogenies](OTT.html) - plotting just phylogenies

[Clustering results](Orthofinder.html) - analysing Orthofinder clustering results

[R gene plotting](plotRgenes.html) - making phylogenies and showing R-gene number differences

[Gene Loss comparison by reads](GeneLossComparisonReads.html) - making heatmaps and barcharts to compare read alignments

[GO enrichment](GOenrichment.html) - running topGO and REVIGO to make nice plots of GO-enrichment

[GO and Ortho](GO_and_ortho.html) - merging plots from GO enrichment and Orthofinder analysis

[MSA visualisation](MSA.html) - visualising MSAs and phylogenies for gene clusters of interest (*SOS3*, *EIN3*)

[3D structure](ThreeDStructure.html) - visualising the predicted 3D structure of *SOS3*/*EIN3*
